thread.section_title: Zip Scanners Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zip Scanners | zipscanners.com
thread.title: Charles Keegan
thread.title_full: Zip Scanners reviewed by Charles Keegan

author: Charles Keegan
title: Charles Keegan
text: Great customer service in helping me choose the scanner for me. No pressure to buy. Gave me options I understood. Once I paid for the scanner it was shipped lighting fast. when I received the scanner it worked right out of the box with the pre programming I chose. I would and am going to recommend Zip Scanners to everyone. Great Scanner, Great Service, Great Big :) Thank You Again!! Chuck K. N.Y.
